title.narrative: LEGISLATION AND BUDGETING FOR CP

description.narrative: All relevant stakeholders have evidence and technical advice on driving legislation and budgeting for child protection., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Justice For Children, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, the Government implements improved and equitable policy for prevention and response to violence, abuse, exploitation and exclusion of the most vulnerable children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: All relevant stakeholders have evidence and technical advice on driving legislation and budgeting for child protection.

description.narrative: UNICEF&39;s provided technical and evidence generation support to the Government resultingin an improved legislative framework for child protection.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2022

title.narrative: Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms (23-03-L3-03), Text

baseline.value: Existing procedures according to national legislative framework are partially aligned with the international standards for the protection of children in conflict with the law, children victims and witnesses in judicial processes.

target.value: 2022:Procedures and services for children in contact with the justice system have been completely aligned with international standards for the protection of children offenders, victims and witnesses in judicial proceedings.

actual.value: 2021:Procedures and services for children in contact with the justice system have been completely aligned with international standards for the protection of children offenders, victims and witnesses in judicial proceedings.
